x = list(map(float, input(" ").split()))
amount=int(x[0])
bal=float(x[1])
if amount+0.5 > bal or amount % 5 != 0:
    print("{:.2f}".format(bal))
else:
    bal = bal - amount-0.5
    print("{:.2f}".format(bal))

inputs=input().split()
amount=int(inputs[0])
account=float(inputs[1])
if amount%5==0 and account>=amount+0.50:
    balance=account-amount-0.50
    print('%.2f'%balance)
else:
    print('%.2f'%account)

x, y = input().split()
x=int(x)
y=float(y)

if x%5==0 and y-x>=0.5 :
    y = y - x - 0.5
print(y)

# cook your dish here
req, total = map(float, input().split())
ans = total
if req >= total:
    ans = total
elif req % 5 != 0:
    ans = total
else:
    ans = total - req - 0.5
ans = total if ans < 0 else ans 
print(ans)

x,y= map(float,input().split())

    x=x+0.5
    if(x<=y):
        y=y-x
